definition: to blow/to play a wind instrument/to blast/to puff/to boast/to brag/to end in failure/to fall through
as easy as blowing off dust/effortless/with ease
pinyin: bu4 fei4 chui1 hui1 zhi1 li4

sentences.english: Without lifting a finger, we get to enjoy sunrises and sunsets.
sentences.chinese: 不用吹灰之力，我们就可以享受日出日落。

sentences.english: You won't have any problem finding rice, noodles, or dumplings.
sentences.chinese: 你将不必费吹灰之力找到大米，面条和饺子。

sentences.english: We had no trouble (in) finding his house.
sentences.chinese: 我们没费吹灰之力就找到了他的家。

sentences.english: Thus did our hero execute the greatest exploits with the utmost ease imaginable.
sentences.chinese: 就这样，我们的英雄没费吹灰之力就干成了大事。

sentences.english: I can do the work standing on my head.
sentences.chinese: 我可以不花吹灰之力干好那工作。

sentences.english: We had no trouble (in) finding his office.
sentences.chinese: 我们没费吹灰之力就找到了他的办公室。

definition: as easy as blowing off dust/effortless/with ease
pinyin: bu4 fei4 chui1 hui1 zhi1 li4

definition: easy as a hand's turn (idiom); very easy/no effort at all
stretch a hand and grab it (idiom); very easy

pinyin: jiu3 niu2 er4 hu3 zhi1 li4

definition: see 易如反掌[yi4 ru2 fan3 zhang3]
as easy as reaching for it from a bag (idiom)/in the bag/(as good as) in one's possession
lit. no blood on the men's swords (idiom); fig. an effortless victory

pinyin: shen2 bu4 zhi1 gui3 bu4 jue2

definition: to be nothing difficult/to be a cinch
like a hot knife through butter (idiom)/with irresistible force
lit. like a turtle in a jar/to be trapped (idiom)
